import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Main.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import CategoriesData from "../datas/CategoriesData"; import CategoriesWomenData from "../datas/CategoriesWomenData"; import CategoriesLimelight from "../datas/CategoriesLimelight"; import FeedbackData from "../datas/FeedbackData"; export const Main = () => { const [currentSlide, setCurrentSlide] = useState(0); const totalSlides = 4; const imageData = [ { src: "assets/img-1.png", alt: "Knitted Joggers", label: "Knitted Joggers" }, { src: "assets/img-3.jpg", alt: "Full Sleeve", label: "Full Sleeve" }, { src: "assets/img-4.jpg", alt: "Active T-Shirts", label: "Active T-Shirts" }, { src: "assets/img-2.jpg", alt: "Urban Shirts", label: "Urban Shirts" }, { src: "assets/img-1.png", alt: "Denim Jacket", label: "Denim Jacket" }, { src: "assets/img-3.jpg", alt: "Casual Hoodie", label: "Casual Hoodie" }, { src: "assets/img-4.jpg", alt: "Summer Shorts", label: "Summer Shorts" }, { src: "assets/img-2.jpg", alt: "Sneakers", label: "Sneakers" }, ]; const maxSlides = imageData.length - totalSlides; const handleClickLeft = () => { setCurrentSlide((prevSlide) => Math.max(prevSlide - 1, 0)); }; const handleClickRight = () => { setCurrentSlide((prevSlide) => Math.min(prevSlide + 1, maxSlides)); }; return ( <> {/* Spotlight Section */}

T-Shirt / Tops

Summer
Value Pack

cool / colorful / comfy

{/* Explore Section */}

  • Low Price

    High Coziness

    UPTO 50% OFF

    Explore Items

  • Beyoung Presents

    Breezy Summer
    Style

    UPTO 50% OFF

    Explore Items
{/* New Arrival Section */}

New Arrival

    {imageData.map((item, index) => (

  • {item.label}

    • ))}
{/* Shop Now Section */}

WE MADE YOUR EVERYDAY
FASHION BETTER!

In our journey to improve everyday fashion,
euphoria presents EVERYDAY wear range -
Comfortable & Affordable fashion 24/7

{/* Categories for Men Section */}

Categories For Men

{CategoriesData.map((category) => (

{category.name}

{category.description}

))}
{/* Categories for Women Section */} {/* Top-Brands Section */}
{/* Limelight Section */}

In The Limelight

{console.log("CategoriesLimelight Data:", CategoriesLimelight)}
{Array.isArray(CategoriesLimelight) && CategoriesLimelight.length > 0 ? ( CategoriesLimelight.map((product) => (

{product.name}

{product.brand}

{product.price}
)) ) : (

No products available

)}
{/* Feedback Section */}

Feedback

{FeedbackData.map((feedback) => (

{feedback.name}

{/* For line breaks */} {Array.isArray(feedback.comment) ? ( feedback.comment.map((line, index) => (

{line}

)) ) : (

{feedback.comment}

)}
))}
); }; export default Main;
